sample:
analyticsService.log({
          data: {
            logLocation,
            productSource,
            contextIntent,
            meta: service.analyticsMeta,
            product,
            unataComponentVariant,
            unataParentComponentVariant,
            cart,
            store,
          },
          event: 'add',
          subject: 'product',
        })

eventEmitter.emit(EVENT_TYPES.LOG_SEGMENT_EVENT, {
      name: 'express.update_subscription',
      segmentArgs: {
        autorenew: body.autorenew,
        cancelled: body.cancel,
        credit_card_updated: 'credit_card_id' in body,
        email_reminder: body.send_reminder_email === 'true',
        next_id: body.next_subsription_plan_id,
        placement_name: referer,
        previous_id: body.subscription_plan_id,
        source: window.location.pathname,
        success: true,
      },
    })
segmentPayloads.identify(globalThis.analytics.identify, { identifiableID })
analyticsService.log({ data: { meta: service.analyticsMeta }, event: 'login' })
logSegmentEvent(clipCouponPayload)
logSegmentEvent(clipCouponPayload)
logSegmentEvent(payload)
logSegmentEvent(payload)
logSegmentEvent({ name, segmentArgs: { ...segmentArgs, userSessionId } })
logSegmentEvent(payload)
logSegmentEvent(payload)

globalThis.gtag('event', event, {
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    currency,
    price,
    value: price,
    category,
    list: logLocation,
    items: [
      {
        item_id: product.id,
        item_name: product.name,
        price: product.base_price,
        discount: product.sale_price ?? 0,
        item_category: product.categories.length > 0
        ? product.categories[product.categories.length - 1].name
        : '',
        location_id: product.fulfillment_retailer_store_id,
        quantity: product.base_quantity,
        item_list_id: cart?.id,
      }
    ]
  })

globalThis.gtag('event', 'select_item', {
    list: location,
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    price: product.sale_price || product.base_price,
    category:
      product.categories.length > 0 ? product.categories[product.categories.length - 1].name : '',
  })

globalThis.gtag('event', 'select_promotion', {
    id: offer.id,
    name: offer.name,
    list: location,
    promotion_id: offer.id,
    promotion_name: offer.name
  })

globalThis.gtag('event', 'ec:addImpression', { 
    id: product.id,
    name: product.name,
    price: product.sale_price || product.base_price,
    category:
      product.categories.length > 0 ? product.categories[product.categories.length - 1].name : '',
    list: location,
  })
globalThis.gtag('event', 'view_item', parameters)
